contentList.content: [GLOBAL] Enable instant summon spell cooldowns when out of combat. (Default)
Add "Toggle Autonomous Behavior" skill, allowing you to toggle ai control for characters in combat.
<font color='#FF0000'>Autonomous behavior skipped for safety reasons.</font>
<font color='#FF0000'>You can't open the settings menu in combat!
Instant Summon Cooldown Outside of Combat
<font color='#FF0000'>*You can't use the contract in combat!*</font>

Conjures the last creature you've summoned at no cost.
Does not work in combat.
Dismiss targeted summons you own within a [1] area of effect.
Remove hidden "Max Summon Increase" status from all characters.
LeaderLib is required for the "Control Summon" skill, which lets you control summons whose portraits are invisible (a current bug with multiple summons).

Commands the targeted (owned) character to control their own actions in combat.
Toggles this behavior on or off, depending on the target's current behavior.
This behavior can be toggled for summons, party members you control, and even yourself.
[GLOBAL] Enable auto-adding the Summoner's Contract when a summon skill is used. (Default)
[GLOBAL] Disable instant summon spell cooldowns when out of combat.
(Disabled - Host Only Menu) Set Max Summon Limit

Summon another creature you last conjured at the target location.
Totems are ignored by the contract.
Character will dictate their own actions in combat.
Add "Control Summon" Skill. This lets you directly control summons you own, whose portraits are invisible.
If enabled, summons skills will have no cooldown outside of combat.
[GLOBAL] Disable auto-adding the Summoner's Contract when a summon skill is used.
Add a copy and apply skill that allows you to copy a summon's infusions, for applying them to other summons.
[Host] Remove all Autonomous tags from all characters.
Remove the copy and apply infusion skills, if added to this character.

Copies and stores the current infusions on an Incarnate.
Only infusions with matching, memorized skills are stored.
Cast again on another Incarnate to override the previously copied infusions.
<font color='#FF0000'>You already have a Tiny Demon's Codex!</font>

Max summons are set to 3 by default, with the option to increase it further. Also contains helper skills for preparing your summons faster outside of combat. Activate Summoning Tweaks - Permanent Summons for permanent summon durations.
[GLOBAL] Enable auto-adding the Dismiss Summon skill when summoning a creature. (Default)
Only the host can change the summon limit cap. Get them to change it for you!
<font color='#FF0000'>Summon a creature before invoking the contract!</font>

Applies copied infusions to targeted summons within a [1] radius within [2].
Only infusions with matching, memorized skills are applied.
[Self] Remove all Autonomous tags from all owned characters.
Teaches <font color='#00FFFF'>Copy Infusions</font> and <font color='#00FA9A'>Apply Infusions</font>, two value spells to speed up Incarnate preparation outside of battle.
*Summon a Tiny Demon's Codex.* (Used to learn the Copy Infusions and Apply Infusions skills.)
The total max summon limit for players.
If enabled, the [Handle:ha3db9492g994eg4761g8929ge5e39c9a2774] will be added when you summon anything, allowing you to resummon it with the codex.
Reset Limit to Summoning Tweaks Default (3)

Copies and stores the current infusions on a summon.
Only infusions with matching, memorized skills are stored.
Cast again on another summon to override the previously copied infusions.

Applies copied infusions to targeted Incarnates within a [1] radius within [2].
Only infusions with matching, memorized skills are applied.

Max Summons: [LLSUMMONINF_MaxSummonLimit_89adccef-225e-47ab-8f10-5add6644ec3b]
Note: Changing the limit will destroy most of your current summons.
[GLOBAL] Disable auto-adding the Dismiss Summon skill when summoning a creature.
